description.en: This course will be held by visiting professor  Jukka Matthias Krisp from University of Augsburg (Germany). The course will be giving brief overview of visual geodata mining. During the course students will get reading materials which later on will follow with discussion. Course also contain exercises with visual data mining programme GeoViz/GeoDa which will be held in the computer room and supervised by prof. Krisp.
description.et: Kursuse juhendajaks on Jukka Matthias Krisp, kes on külalisprofessor Augsburgi Ülikoolist (Saksamaa). Kursus annab ülevaate visuaalsete asukohandmete andmekaevest. Kursuse jooksul tudengid saavad lugemismaterjale, mille läbitöötamisel järgneb elav arutelu loetu üle. Kursus sisaldab ka praktilist osa, mis viiakse läbi prof. Krispi juhendamisel arvutiruumis kasutades andmekaeve programme GeoViz/GeoDa.

objectives.en: The course deals with spatial and visual data mining techniques in multivariate data sets.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on anda ülevaade ruumilise ja visuaalse andmete andmekaevete tehnikatest mitme muutujaga andmestikus.

learning_outcomes.en: * understand applications and methods to "visual data mining"
learning_outcomes.et: *	saab aru ning oskab kasutada "visuaalse andmekaeve" rakendusi ning meetodeid
*	oskab kasutada visuaalse andmekaeve tööriistu programmis GeoViz/GeoDa

learning_outcomes.en: * use methods and applications of "visual spatial data mining"
learning_outcomes.et: * kasutab "visuaalse ruumilise andmekaeve" meetodeid ja rakendusi

learning_outcomes.en: * evaluate methods of "visual spatial data mining

independent_work.et: Exercise I, II and III - guidelines delivered during the lab sessions.

grade_preconditions.et: Participate in lectures and in lab sessions.

grade_evaluation.et: Excerice I, II and III submitted by the given deadline.

description.et:
Welcome & Introduction Round
lecture – What is the point of visual data mining? & selected VGDM tools
short intro - Exercise I (GeoViz & iris)

lecture - VGDM in risk analysis & Error detection
Q&A –Reading Material I (Robinson)
Working time for exercise I (iris)

Comparison Results Exercise I (GeoViz & iris)
Tobon Exploration Model
Short intro - Exercise II (GeoDA)

Discussion VGDM & Geo AI? Does it work?
Reading Material II (Demsar) –reading time -
Working time for exercise II (GeoDA)

Comparison Results - Exercise II (GeoDA)
Discussion wrap-up, optional Into EX IV (exploration tasks) + individual mining task
Intro EX III (GeoViz and climate data) - + (optional) possible results - Exercise III (Climate)
